# **Data Processing and Plotting**

This is the webpage for my project Data Processing and Plotting in R. It currently has a R package named "dppbar" which stand for "Data Processing and Plotting for Business Analysis in R". This webpage will be contain vignettes and updates for that package, as well as blogs about using it in real life data analysis projects.

## What You can find here?

1. Discreption about this R package and the major features and functions about it. See the  [Overview page](https://jkang37.github.io/Data-Processing-and-Plotting/Overview.html).

2. Vignettes for the package, which include user's guide and some examples in using it to do data analysis projects. See the [Vignettes page](https://jkang37.github.io/Data-Processing-and-Plotting/Vignettes.html) 

3. See the [Blogs page](https://jkang37.github.io/Data-Processing-and-Plotting/Blogs.html) for blogs about using this package to simplify data processing and plotting works, and also update to the package.

3. See the [Links page](https://jkang37.github.io/Data-Processing-and-Plotting/Links.html) for lots of helpful links on learning R.
